errors.error_description: The example code demonstrates calling `fit.summary()` before the `fit` object is created by `model.sample()`, which will cause a NameError.
correction_candidates: Initialize `fit` before the summary call: `fit = None`.
The `summary` method should be called on the model, not the fit object: `model.summary()`.
Move the `fit = model.sample(...)` line before the `fit.summary()` line.
Combine the calls into one line: `model.sample(chains=4, data=data_file).summary()`.
errors.golden_answer: Move the `fit = model.sample(...)` line before the `fit.summary()` line.
